name: Vtp 😊
wishText: On your special day, I want to remind you how much you mean to me. I hope you become more and more beautiful, healthy, and successful in the future!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, it's time to open the birthday gift. Click here
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
